722006f-a.title: Manhattan: Orchard Street - Hester Street
722006f-a.text:
Orchard Street, west side, north from Hester Street. Also
shown is Hester Street at the N.W. corner of Crchard Street. The
view shows the pushcart peddler's market on Orchard Street.
April 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

7l Hester treet, north side between Orchard and Ludlow

720416f-a.title: Manhattan: Hester Street - Orchard Street
720416f-a.text:
Hester Street, west from, but not iacluding Orchard Street, showing a
portion of the Seeond Ave. Elevated Line on Allew Street, and in the far back-
groumd, a portion of the Third Ave. Elevated Liwe oa the Bowery.
June 12, 1931.
P. L. Sper'.

720414f-a.title: Manhattan: Hester Street - Orchard Street
720414f-a.text:
62-66 Hester Street, at, adjoining and east of the S.E. corner of
Orchard Street. No. 64 Hester Street, adjoining the S.E. corner of
Orchard Street, is a 3-story frame house with a brick front.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 555.
